content: crochet top manon design martina taborsky size 34-36-38 version nr 1 this bra is suitable for fuller bust cup c d yarn catania fy schachenmayr or limone fy schoeller 100% cotton 125 m / 50 g cca 100 g hook nr 3-3 5 bodice the bodice is made form 4 square motifs which we join together during the work = 2 motifs for front 2 motifs for back motif schema nr 1 motif chain 10 join with slip_stitch in ring 1 row chain 3 23 double_crochet in the ring = 24 double_crochet 2 row chain 3 *chain 5 skip 2 double_crochet previous row 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet* from * till * repeat 6 more times chain 5 join with slip_stitch in ther 3rd chain at the beginning 3 row chain 3 *7 double_crochet in the chain-5 space 1 double_crochet in double_crochet* from* till repeat 6 times more 7 double_crochet and join with slip_stitch in ther 3rd chain at the beginning = 64 double_crochet 4 row slip_stitch in first double_crochet chain 3 6 double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet *chain 5 skip 1 double_crochet 7 double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet* from * till * repeat 7 times more chain 5 join with slip_stitch in ther 3rd chain at the beginning 5 row chain 3 4 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet *chain 5 1 single_crochet in chain-5 space chain 5 5 double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet t m skip first and last double_crochet* from * till * repeat 7 times more chain 5 1 single_crochet in chain-5 space chain 5 join with slip_stitch in ther 3rd chain at the beginning 6 row chain 3 2 double_crochet together in next 2 double_crochet *chain 5 single_crochet in chain-5 space chain 11 single_crochet in chain-5 space chain 5 3 double_crochet together in middle 3 double_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in chain-5 space chain 5 single_crochet in chain-5 space chain 5* from * till * repeat 3 times more join with slip_stitch in ther 3rd chain at the beginning schema nr 1 motif by crocheting the 2nd square motif we join it together with the first with slip_stitch in corners = t m 2 x in the cornes by chain 5 and 3 x in the middle by chain 3 in the same way we join also the trd and 4th motif which we join in the same way with the first motif = we join them all together across these joined motifs we crochet 1 row of edge trim schema nr 2 edge trim one side of square motif join the yarn with slip_stitch in one corner of 2 joined motifs chain 5 double_crochet in the first chain of chain-11 space chain 5 single_crochet in 3 together double_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in chain-3 space chain 5 single_crochet in chain-3 space chain 5 single_crochet in chain-3 space chain 5 single_crochet in 3 together double_crochet double_crochet in the first chain of chain-11 space chain 5 double_crochet in the sth chain of the chain-11 space this edge trim we
